      • republishMessage

        private void republishMessage(java.lang.String topic,
                              java.lang.String message,
                              io.moquette.server.Server mqttBroker)
        Republishes a message into the purpose topology. Retrieves the message topic and tries to match it to an existing Policy. Then, creates a new instance of a VatenfallPurposeMessage, transforms the message based on the policy and republishes the message into the purpose topology.
        Parameters:
        topic - a message was published to
        message - message payload (data)
        mqttBroker - broker instance

      • addAdditionalProperties

        private void addAdditionalProperties(VattenfallMessage vattenfallMessage,
                                     Purpose purpose,
                                     VattenfallPurposeMessage vattenfallPurposeMessage)
                              throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                     java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Appends additional properties to a message, as specified in the purpose
        Parameters:
        vattenfallMessage - original message
        purpose - Purpose specified for the given topic by a client that sent the message
        vattenfallPurposeMessage - transformed vatenfallMessage containing desired fields.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException

        Parameters:
